description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 4 i, (a) only (Contamination scheme) of planning permission ref. 77095/APP/2023/1879, dated 25-09-2023 (Conversion of 1 detached workshop into 2 no. 2-bedroom houses (Application for Prior Approval under Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)).)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge only of Condition 4 Part A (Contaminated Land) attached to planning permission ref. 77095/APP/2023/2856. Further details related to Part b and c of the condition are required in order to fully discharge the condition.
